page.description: The PropertyGrid object is useful when you want to display many prompts to the user and accept many inputs.

item.name: .ExpandItem()
item.description: Type V. Expands or contracts a named category.

item.name: .IsExpanded()
item.description: Type L. Returns TRUE (.T.) if a category is expanded.

item.name: .SetFocus()
item.description: Type V. Sets focus to an item, expanding its container category if necessary.
